tool_description: AI-driven endpoints for quick, simple tools for Grammar Correction, Ad Copy writing and text summarization (TL;DR)!
name: AI Toolkit
title: AI Toolkit

api_list.name: grammerCorrection
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com/ai/grammar-correction"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
